alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:32PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LIGHT RAIN/SNOW MIX CHANGING TO LIGHT SNOW WILL CREATE SCATTERED SLIPPERY STRETCHES ON AREA ROADS THIS EVENING... Radar indicated an area of mixed light rain and snow over far northeast Wisconsin generally north of Highway 64. Watch out for scattered slippery spots as the mixed precipitation changes over to light snow. Although the light snow should gradually taper off after midnight, roads may still be slippery as temperatures slowly fall to near the freezing mark If you have travel plans tonight, slow down and allow a little extra time to reach your destination. Locally slippery driving conditions will be possible, especially on untreated secondary roads, intersections, bridges and overpasses.
